changeSet.sql: CREATE FUNCTION dbo.generateMultiLanguageJson(@en varchar(MAX), @cs varchar(MAX), @de varchar(MAX)) RETURNS varchar(MAX) AS BEGIN DECLARE @singleLanguageTemplate varchar(MAX)= N'{"langIso":"{{langIso}}","content":"{{content}}"}' DECLARE @multipleLanguageTemplate varchar(MAX)= N'[]' DECLARE @en_json varchar(MAX) = JSON_MODIFY(JSON_MODIFY(@singleLanguageTemplate, '$.langIso', 'en'), '$.content', @en) DECLARE @cs_json varchar(MAX) = JSON_MODIFY(JSON_MODIFY(@singleLanguageTemplate, '$.langIso', 'cs'), '$.content', @cs) DECLARE @de_json varchar(MAX) = JSON_MODIFY(JSON_MODIFY(@singleLanguageTemplate, '$.langIso', 'de'), '$.content', @de) DECLARE @result_json varchar(MAX) = JSON_MODIFY(JSON_MODIFY(JSON_MODIFY(@multipleLanguageTemplate, 'append $', JSON_QUERY(@en_json)), 'append $', JSON_QUERY(@cs_json)), 'append $', JSON_QUERY(@de_json)) RETURN @result_json END

DECLARE @arrayJsonTemplate nvarchar(MAX) = N'[]' DECLARE @sameDay varchar(MAX) = 'SAME_DAY' DECLARE @nextDay varchar(MAX) = 'NEXT_DAY' DECLARE @partial varchar(MAX) = 'PARTIALLY_AVAILABLE' DECLARE @notAvailable varchar(MAX) = 'NOT_AVAILABLE'
DECLARE @panelTitleSameDay varchar(MAX) = 'Available same day' DECLARE @panelTitleNextDay varchar(MAX) = 'Available next day' DECLARE @panelTitlePartialAvailability varchar(MAX) = 'Partially available' DECLARE @panelTitleNotAvailability varchar(MAX) = 'Not available'
DECLARE @descriptionSameDay varchar(MAX) = 'If delivery type pickup, and an article is immediately available at the local branch, then the term "Immediate" is displayed, regardless of whether a display text has been entered or not.'
DECLARE @colorSameDay varchar(MAX) = '#02ad02' DECLARE @colorNextDay varchar(MAX) = '#ffb74c' DECLARE @colorPartial varchar(MAX) = '#00b4f0' DECLARE @colorNotAvailable varchar(MAX) = '#ff161f' DECLARE @confirmColor varchar(MAX) = '#333'
DECLARE @listAvailText_sameday_en varchar(MAX) = 'Today' DECLARE @listAvailText_sameday_de varchar(MAX) = 'Heute' DECLARE @listAvailText_sameday_cs varchar(MAX) = 'Dnes'
DECLARE @listAvailText_nextday_en varchar(MAX) = 'Next working day' DECLARE @listAvailText_nextday_de varchar(MAX) = 'Nächster Arbeitstag' DECLARE @listAvailText_nextday_cs varchar(MAX) = 'Následující pracovní den'
DECLARE @listAvailText_partial_en varchar(MAX) = 'Partial quantity available' DECLARE @listAvailText_partial_de varchar(MAX) = 'Teilmenge verfügbar' DECLARE @listAvailText_partial_cs varchar(MAX) = 'Částečné množství k dispozici'
DECLARE @listAvailText_notavail_en varchar(MAX) = 'Not available' DECLARE @listAvailText_notavail_de varchar(MAX) = 'Nicht verfügbar' DECLARE @listAvailText_notavail_cs varchar(MAX) = 'Nedostupné'
DECLARE @detailAvailText_notavail_en varchar(MAX) = 'If the item is not available within 24 hours, you will be informed.' DECLARE @detailAvailText_notavail_de varchar(MAX) = 'Sollte der Artikel nicht innerhalb von 24 Std lieferbar sein, werden Sie informiert.' DECLARE @detailAvailText_notavail_cs varchar(MAX) = 'Pokud článek nebude k dispozici do 24 hodin, budete o tom informováni.'
DECLARE @defaultDisplayOption varchar(MAX) = 'NONE' DECLARE @notAvailDisplayOption varchar(MAX) = 'DOT'
DECLARE @collectionIdTable TABLE(id int) INSERT INTO @collectionIdTable SELECT ID FROM ORGANISATION_COLLECTION oc WHERE oc.SHORTNAME <> 'sag'
DECLARE @collectionId int DECLARE CollectionCursor CURSOR FOR SELECT ID from @collectionIdTable OPEN collectionCursor FETCH NEXT FROM CollectionCursor INTO @collectionId WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0 BEGIN
DECLARE @listAvailText_sameday_json varchar(MAX) = dbo.generateMultiLanguageJson(@listAvailText_sameday_en, @listAvailText_sameday_cs, @listAvailText_sameday_de) DECLARE @listAvailText_nextday_json varchar(MAX) = dbo.generateMultiLanguageJson(@listAvailText_sameday_en, @listAvailText_sameday_cs, @listAvailText_sameday_de) DECLARE @listAvailText_partial_json varchar(MAX) = dbo.generateMultiLanguageJson(@listAvailText_sameday_en, @listAvailText_sameday_cs, @listAvailText_sameday_de) DECLARE @listAvailText_notavailable_json varchar(MAX) = dbo.generateMultiLanguageJson(@listAvailText_notavail_en, @listAvailText_notavail_cs, @listAvailText_notavail_de)
DECLARE @detailAvailText_notavailable_json varchar(MAX) = dbo.generateMultiLanguageJson(@detailAvailText_notavail_en, @detailAvailText_notavail_cs, @detailAvailText_notavail_de)
DECLARE @samedayJson varchar(MAX) = dbo.generateSingleAvailTypeJson(@sameDay, NULL, @listAvailText_sameday_json, @panelTitleSameDay, @descriptionSameDay, @colorSameDay, NULL, @defaultDisplayOption) DECLARE @nextdayJson varchar(MAX) = dbo.generateSingleAvailTypeJson(@nextDay, NULL, @listAvailText_nextday_json, @panelTitleNextDay, NULL, @colorNextDay, NULL, @defaultDisplayOption) DECLARE @partiallyJson varchar(MAX) = dbo.generateSingleAvailTypeJson(@partial, NULL, @listAvailText_partial_json, @panelTitlePartialAvailability, NULL, @colorPartial, NULL, @defaultDisplayOption) DECLARE @notAvailableJson varchar(MAX) = dbo.generateSingleAvailTypeJson(@notAvailable, @detailAvailText_notavailable_json, @listAvailText_notavailable_json, @panelTitleNotAvailability, NULL, @colorNotAvailable, @confirmColor , @notAvailDisplayOption)
DECLARE @resultJson nvarchar(MAX) = JSON_MODIFY(JSON_MODIFY(JSON_MODIFY(JSON_MODIFY(@arrayJsonTemplate, 'append $', JSON_QUERY(@samedayJson)), 'append $', JSON_QUERY(@nextdayJson)), 'append $', JSON_QUERY(@partiallyJson)), 'append $', JSON_QUERY(@notAvailableJson)) DELETE dbo.ORG_COLLECTION_SETTINGS WHERE COLLECTION_ID = @collectionId AND SETTING_KEY = 'availability_display' INSERT INTO dbo.ORG_COLLECTION_SETTINGS (COLLECTION_ID, SETTING_KEY, SETTING_VALUE) VALUES(@collectionId, N'availability_display', @resultJson) FETCH NEXT FROM CollectionCursor INTO @collectionId END CLOSE CollectionCursor DEALLOCATE CollectionCursor
DROP FUNCTION dbo.generateSingleAvailTypeJson DROP FUNCTION dbo.generateMultiLanguageJson
